Tyrrrz/YoutubeExplode

Library for querying YouTube metadata, video streams, and captions

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Search YouTube videos using natural language
  • transcribes YouTube videos by URL, outputs text and metadata
  • Python API for getting YouTube video transcripts and subtitles, including auto-generated ones
  • Video embeddings for search and classification
  • Downloads YouTube streams based on keywords
  • Downloads videos and playlists from YouTube
  • Framework for YouTube channel audits and niche research
  • Python library for automating YouTube Music actions like searching, managing playlists, and uploading songs
  • Streams videos without ads or recommendations
